resources.string: HH Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj

HH Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj App is collection of lectures by His Holiness Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj.\n Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj is a Vaishnava sanyassi (a monk in a Krishna-bhakti lineage) connecte to ISKCON and teacher of the devotional path of Bhakti-yoga.

With HH Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj App, you have access to vast collection of His Holiness HH Rādhā Govind Dās Goswāmi Mahārāj\'s lectures, Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s Books, and Śrīla Prabhupāda\'s daily quotes.
